title: Piaggio India launches updated version of Aprilia SR scooter range
description: The all-new Aprilia SR 160 will be available at Rs 1.17 lakh, while the Aprilia SR 125 at Rs 1.07 lakh, Piaggio India, which is the wholly-owned subsidiary of Italian auto major Piaggio Group, announced at the launch event.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
